Name: TypeOfSamplingProcedure
Description: A generic means of classifying a SamplingProcedure. Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary.

Name: Description
Description: Full description of the sampling procedure. Supports structured content and multiple language content.

Name: SamplingPlanReference
Description: Reference to sample plan which describes a process for achieving the sample. TypeOfObject should be SamplingPlan.

Name: SampleReference
Description: Reference to sample created using sampling procedure. TypeOfObject should be Sample.
